mapper.select: select * from chat where (bang_id, msg_date) in (select bang_id, max(msg_date) as msg_date from chat group by bang_id) and (send_id=#{id} or receive_id=#{id}) order by bang_id limit 1
select bang_id from chat where (send_id=#{send_id} or send_id=#{receive_id}) and (receive_id=#{send_id} or receive_id=#{receive_id}) limit 1
select message from chat where bang_id=#{bang_id}
